directions: Combine chickpeas, peanut butter, cocoa powder, maple syrup, dates, soy milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a food processor until creamy. Transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate 1 to 2 hours. Serve chilled.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 tablespoon unsweetened soy milk, or more as needed
title: Peanut Butter-Chocolate Hummus
